page.title: 08A King's Sutton Resident
page.content: We talked to Mrs C. who has lived in Kings Sutton for about twenty years. She loves the village and thinks the people in her street are very friendly and kind. She does not want to move. She lives in Wales Street which is very near the railway station. She rides a bicycle most of the time, as she does nearly all of her shopping in the village because she thinks the shops are very good. If she does need to go to Banbury, she uses the train because it is nearer and cheaper than the bus. Mrs C., who used to be a school governess, served on the Parish Council and wrote the village newsletter. She enjoys going to the Women's Institute and also baby-sitting and going to jumble sales.
